Module zti.utils
Package by.zti.main.grabber

Class ModuleGrabber

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.zti.main.grabber.ModuleGrabber

  • public class ModuleGrabber
extends java.lang.Object
    This singleton is designed to look for jar files is specific directory and load them dynamically at runtime. It uses marker annotation "Hookable" with it's "value" field containing init method name to find appropriate start class in jar file to initialize module. Init method must be public and must have no parameter.
    Since:
    ZTIU 1.0.6

      ModuleGrabber grab​(java.lang.String dir)
      This method will scan given directory for jar files and load them to the JVM memory.

      • grab

        public ModuleGrabber grab​(java.lang.String dir)

        Returns:

      • initModules

        public void initModules​()
